thread.title: Pres. When Open Your Heart to Patriotism, No Room for Prejudice
thread.title_full: Pres. Trump: When Open Your Heart to Patriotism, No Room for Prejudice

author: Chandler Gill
title: Pres. When Open Your Heart to Patriotism, No Room for Prejudice
text:
President Donald Trump on Friday spoke about the importance of unity during his inauguration to become 45th president of   Washington, D.C. He said that when the American people can open their hearts to patriotism, there is no room for prejudice.
“At the bedrock of our politics will be a total allegiance to the United States of America, and through our loyalty to our country, we will rediscover our loyalty to each other,” he said.
